showTitles.name: Show note titles in all notes and collections
showTitles.desc: Display the filename/note title below highlights when viewing All Notes or Collections.

showActions.name: Show highlight actions
showActions.desc: Display the actions area below each highlight (filename, stats, and buttons).

showToolbar.name: Show toolbar
showToolbar.desc: Display the toolbar with search, grouping, and other action buttons.

autoUnfold.name: Auto-unfold on focus
autoUnfold.desc: Automatically unfold content when focusing highlights from the sidebar.

dateFormat.name: Date format
dateFormat.desc: Format string for timestamps using moment.js syntax (e.g., YYYY-MM-DD HH:mm, MMM DD YYYY, DD/MM/YYYY h:mm A).

minimumCharCount.name: Minimum character count
minimumCharCount.desc: Hide highlights and native comments shorter than this character count from the sidebar (default 0).

showCurrentNoteTab.name: Show Current Note tab
showCurrentNoteTab.desc: Show the Current Note tab in the sidebar.

showAllNotesTab.name: Show All Notes tab
showAllNotesTab.desc: Show the All Notes tab in the sidebar.

showCollectionsTab.name: Show Collections tab
showCollectionsTab.desc: Show the Collections tab in the sidebar.

showTasksTab.name: Show Tasks tab
showTasksTab.desc: Show the Tasks tab in the sidebar.

displayModes.heading: Display modes
displayModes.saveCurrentLabel: Save current settings as a display mode
displayModes.saveCurrentDesc: Create a new display mode from your current Display and Views settings. Saved modes can be applied from the Command Palette or using the Apply button below.
displayModes.noModes: No display modes saved yet. Create one to get started.
displayModes.updateTooltip: Update this mode with current settings

detailsTextSize.name: Details text size
detailsTextSize.desc: Adjust details text size (filename, line number, etc) (default 11).

highlightTextWeight.name: Highlight text weight
highlightTextWeight.desc: Adjust font weight for sidebar highlights (default Normal).

taskTextWeight.name: Task text weight
taskTextWeight.desc: Adjust font weight for sidebar tasks (default Normal).

colors.heading: Colors
colors.customizeFirst: Customize the first highlight color for the sidebar hover color picker.
colors.customizeSecond: Customize the second highlight color for the sidebar hover color picker.
colors.customizeThird: Customize the third highlight color for the sidebar hover color picker.
colors.customizeFourth: Customize the fourth highlight color for the sidebar hover color picker.
colors.customizeFifth: Customize the fifth highlight color for the sidebar hover color picker.

colorNames.heading: Color names
colorNames.desc: Optional: Add a custom name for this color to use in Group By Color instead of the hex code.

useInlineFootnotes.name: Use inline footnotes by default
useInlineFootnotes.desc: When adding comments via the sidebar, use inline footnotes (^[comment]) instead of standard footnotes ([^ref]: comment).

selectTextOnClick.name: Select text on click
selectTextOnClick.desc: When clicking a comment, select the comment instead of positioning the cursor in front of it. Note: Only works for inline footnotes (^[...]) and standard footnotes ([^1]), not HTML comments or custom patterns.

detectHtmlComments.name: Detect HTML comments
detectHtmlComments.desc: Detect HTML comments (<!-- -->) as highlights. Note: HTML comments are hidden in Live Preview mode and only visible in Source mode.

detectAdjacentNativeComments.name: Detect adjacent native comments
detectAdjacentNativeComments.desc: When enabled, native Obsidian comments (%% %%) that appear immediately after a highlight will be treated as comments for that highlight. When disabled, all native comments appear separately in the sidebar.

customPatterns.heading: Custom patterns
customPatterns.desc: Define custom highlight or comment patterns using regex. This allows detection of syntax from other plugins or custom formats.

excludeExcalidraw.name: Exclude Excalidraw files
excludeExcalidraw.desc: Skip .excalidraw files when scanning for highlights. This prevents highlights from being detected in Excalidraw drawing files.

excludedFiles.name: File filters
excludedFiles.desc: Include or exclude specific files and folders from being scanned for highlights and tasks.

showTaskContext.name: Show task notes
showTaskContext.desc: Tasks containing bulleted text will display as notes under the task.

showCompletedTasks.name: Show completed tasks
showCompletedTasks.desc: Include completed tasks (- [x]) in the Tasks tab.

showCurrentNoteSection.name: Show current note tasks
showCurrentNoteSection.desc: Display a dedicated section at the top of the Tasks tab showing tasks from the currently active note.

showOnlyCurrentNoteTasks.name: Only display current note tasks
showOnlyCurrentNoteTasks.desc: When enabled, hide all other tasks and only show tasks from the current note.

taskDateFormat.name: Due date format
taskDateFormat.desc: Date format for parsing due dates in tasks (e.g., YYYY-MM-DD, MM/DD/YYYY). Due dates matching this format will be displayed as badges.

emptyStates.noMatchingAcrossAll: No matching highlights across all files.
emptyStates.noHighlightsAcrossAll: No highlights found across all files.
emptyStates.noMatchingTasks: No matching tasks across all files.
emptyStates.noTasksAcrossAll: No tasks found across all files.

collection.descDesc: Provide more context about the collection (Optional)

excludedFiles.noFilter: No file filters are applied. Add one below.
excludedFiles.currentlyExcluded: Files matching the following filters are currently excluded:
excludedFiles.currentlyIncluded: Files matching the following filters are currently included:
excludedFiles.alreadyExists: {{path}} is already in the filter list

customPattern.patternDesc: Regex pattern with a capturing group for the content. Examples:
customPattern.typeDesc: Whether to treat matches as highlights or comments

customPattern.capturingGroupRequired: Pattern must include a capturing group, e.g., //(.+)//
